description.value:
You can remove conditions with divine grace.

You can sacrifice one @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] spell you've prepared in your extra slots from healing font to cast one of the following spells instead: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Remove Curse], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Remove Disease], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Remove Paralysis], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Restoration]. The spell is heightened to the same level as the heal spell you sacrificed.
